targets.rawSql:
SELECT     count(*) AS TOT_righe, 
    SUM(CASE WHEN file_name LIKE '%PH%' collate CASE_LIKE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS PH_ART,
   SUM(CASE WHEN file_name LIKE '%EH%' collate CASE_LIKE  THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS EH_EAN,
   SUM(CASE WHEN file_name LIKE '%IH%' collate CASE_LIKE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS IH_INGR_ALLERG,
   SUM(CASE WHEN file_name LIKE '%FH%'collate CASE_LIKE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FH_FORN,
   SUM(CASE WHEN file_name LIKE '%HH%' collate CASE_LIKE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS HH_ASSFORN,
   SUM( CASE WHEN processing_step1 <>0 THEN 1 END) AS FASE1_ELAB ,
   SUM( CASE WHEN processing_step1 <>0 and processing_step2 <>0  THEN 1 END) AS FASE2_ELAB,
   SUM( CASE WHEN processing_step1 <>0 and processing_step2 <>0  and processing_step3 <>0 THEN 1 END) AS FASE3_ELAB,
   SUM( CASE WHEN processing_step1 <>0 and processing_step2 <>0  and processing_step3 <>0 and processing_step4 <>0THEN 1 END) AS FASE4_ELAB
  --- count(distinct ITEM) AS TOT_ART, 
  --  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN file_name LIKE '%PH%' collate CASE_LIKE THEN item END) AS FLUSSOPH_ART,
   -- COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN file_name LIKE '%EH%' collate CASE_LIKE THEN item END) AS FLUSSOEH_EAN,
  --  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN file_name LIKE '%IH%' collate CASE_LIKE THEN item END) AS FLUSSOIH_INGR_ALLERG,
  --  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN file_name LIKE '%FH%' collate CASE_LIKE THEN item END) AS FLUSSOFH_FORN,
  --  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN file_name LIKE '%SH%' collate CASE_LIKE THEN item END) AS FLUSSOSH_ASSFORN
FROM tin_data_item_in
WHERE creation_date BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
  ----AND file_name LIKE '%IH%' COLLATE CASE_LIKE
  AND (network IS NULL OR network IN ($vg_store));

panels.title: TOTALI  RIGHE PER TIPO FLUSSO E FASE DI ELABORAZIONE

targets.rawSql:
SELECT     
   SUM( CASE WHEN file_name LIKE '%PH%' collate CASE_LIKE and processing_step1 =1 and processing_step2 =1   THEN 1 END) AS PH_TOT,  
      SUM( CASE WHEN file_name LIKE '%PH%' collate CASE_LIKE and processing_step1 =1 and processing_step2 =1  and processing_step3 not in(1,2) THEN 1 END) AS PH_DA_ELAB , 
   SUM( CASE WHEN file_name LIKE '%PH%' collate CASE_LIKE and processing_step1 =1 and processing_step2 =1  and processing_step3 =1 THEN 1 END) AS PH_OK,  
   SUM( CASE WHEN file_name LIKE '%PH%' collate CASE_LIKE and processing_step1 =1 and processing_step2 =1  and processing_step3 =2 THEN 1 END) AS PH_KO
FROM tin_data_item_in
WHERE creation_date BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
  ----AND file_name LIKE '%IH%' COLLATE CASE_LIKE
  AND (network IS NULL OR network IN ($vg_store));

SELECT    COUNT(*) AS PH_righe, 
   SUM(CASE WHEN processing_step1 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FASE1_FILE,
   SUM(CASE WHEN processing_step1 = 1 and processing_step2 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FASE2_ARRICHFILE,
   SUM(CASE WHEN processing_step1 = 1 and processing_step2 = 1  and processing_step3 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FASE3_CAR_BOOM,
   SUM(CASE WHEN processing_step1 = 1 and processing_step2 = 1  and processing_step3 = 1 and processing_step4 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FASE4_REGIA
   --COUNT(DISTINCT item) AS PH_ARTICOLI,
   --COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN processing_step1 = 1 THEN item END) AS FASE1_FILE_ART ,
   --COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN processing_step1 = 1 and processing_step2 = 1  THEN item END) AS FASE2_ARRICHFILE_ART,
   --COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN processing_step1 = 1 and processing_step2 = 1  and processing_step3 = 1 THEN item END) AS FASE3_CAR_BOOM_ART,
   --COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN processing_step1 = 1 and processing_step2 = 1  and processing_step3 = 1 and processing_step4 = 1 THEN item END) AS FASE4_REGIA_ART
FROM tin_data_item_in
WHERE creation_date BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
  AND file_name LIKE '%PH%' COLLATE CASE_LIKE
  AND (network IS NULL OR network IN ($vg_store));

panels.title: Flusso PH - Articoli e Informazioni Anagrafiche

targets.rawSql:
SELECT    
   SUM( CASE WHEN file_name LIKE '%EH%' collate CASE_LIKE and processing_step1 =1 and processing_step2 =1   THEN 1 END) AS EH_TOT,  
      SUM( CASE WHEN file_name LIKE '%EH%' collate CASE_LIKE and processing_step1 =1 and processing_step2 =1  and processing_step3 not in(1,2) THEN 1 END) AS EH_DA_ELAB , 
   SUM( CASE WHEN file_name LIKE '%EH%' collate CASE_LIKE and processing_step1 =1 and processing_step2 =1  and processing_step3 =1 THEN 1 END) AS EH_OK,  
   SUM( CASE WHEN file_name LIKE '%EH%' collate CASE_LIKE and processing_step1 =1 and processing_step2 =1  and processing_step3 =2 THEN 1 END) AS EH_KO
FROM tin_data_item_in
WHERE creation_date BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
  ----AND file_name LIKE '%IH%' COLLATE CASE_LIKE
  AND (network IS NULL OR network IN ($vg_store));

SELECT    COUNT(*) AS EH_righe, 
   SUM(CASE WHEN processing_step1 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FASE1_FILE,
   SUM(CASE WHEN processing_step1 = 1 and processing_step2 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FASE2_ARRICHFILE,
   SUM(CASE WHEN processing_step1 = 1 and processing_step2 = 1  and processing_step3 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FASE3_CAR_BOOM,
   SUM(CASE WHEN processing_step1 = 1 and processing_step2 = 1  and processing_step3 = 1 and processing_step4 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FASE4_REGIA
  -- COUNT(DISTINCT item) AS EH_ARTICOLI,
  -- COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN processing_step1 = 1 THEN item END) AS FASE1_FILE_ART ,
  -- COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN processing_step1 = 1 and processing_step2 = 1  THEN item END) AS FASE2_ARRICHFILE_ART,
  -- COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN processing_step1 = 1 and processing_step2 = 1  and processing_step3 = 1 THEN item END) AS FASE3_CAR_BOOM_ART,
   --COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN processing_step1 = 1 and processing_step2 = 1  and processing_step3 = 1 and processing_step4 = 1 THEN item END) AS FASE4_REGIA_ART
FROM tin_data_item_in
WHERE creation_date BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
  AND file_name LIKE  '%EH%' COLLATE CASE_LIKE
  AND (network IS NULL OR network IN ($vg_store));

SELECT     
   SUM( CASE WHEN file_name LIKE '%IH%' collate CASE_LIKE and processing_step1 =1 and processing_step2 =1   THEN 1 END) AS IH_TOT,  
      SUM( CASE WHEN file_name LIKE '%IH%' collate CASE_LIKE and processing_step1 =1 and processing_step2 =1  and processing_step3 not in(1,2) THEN 1 END) AS IH_DA_ELAB , 
   SUM( CASE WHEN file_name LIKE '%IH%' collate CASE_LIKE and processing_step1 =1 and processing_step2 =1  and processing_step3 =1 THEN 1 END) AS IH_OK,  
   SUM( CASE WHEN file_name LIKE '%IH%' collate CASE_LIKE and processing_step1 =1 and processing_step2 =1  and processing_step3 =2 THEN 1 END) AS IH_KO
FROM tin_data_item_in
WHERE creation_date BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
  ----AND file_name LIKE '%IH%' COLLATE CASE_LIKE
  AND (network IS NULL OR network IN ($vg_store));

SELECT    COUNT(*) AS IH_righe, 
   SUM(CASE WHEN processing_step1 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FASE1_FILE,
   SUM(CASE WHEN processing_step1 = 1 and processing_step2 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FASE2_ARRICHFILE,
   SUM(CASE WHEN processing_step1 = 1 and processing_step2 = 1  and processing_step3 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FASE3_CAR_BOOM,
   SUM(CASE WHEN processing_step1 = 1 and processing_step2 = 1  and processing_step3 = 1 and processing_step4 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FASE4_REGIA
  --- COUNT(DISTINCT item) AS IH_ARTICOLI,
  --- COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN processing_step1 = 1 THEN item END) AS FASE1_FILE_ART ,
  --- COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN processing_step1 = 1 and processing_step2 = 1  THEN item END) AS FASE2_ARRICHFILE_ART,
  --- COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN processing_step1 = 1 and processing_step2 = 1  and processing_step3 = 1 THEN item END) AS FASE3_CAR_BOOM_ART,
   ---COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN processing_step1 = 1 and processing_step2 = 1  and processing_step3 = 1 and processing_step4 = 1 THEN item END) AS FASE4_REGIA_ART
FROM tin_data_item_in
WHERE creation_date BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
  AND file_name LIKE '%IH%' COLLATE CASE_LIKE
  AND (network IS NULL OR network IN ($vg_store));

SELECT     
   SUM( CASE WHEN file_name LIKE '%FH%' collate CASE_LIKE and processing_step1 =1 and processing_step2 =1   THEN 1 END) AS FH_TOT,  
      SUM( CASE WHEN file_name LIKE '%FH%' collate CASE_LIKE and processing_step1 =1 and processing_step2 =1  and processing_step3 not in(1,2) THEN 1 END) AS FH_DA_ELAB , 
   SUM( CASE WHEN file_name LIKE '%FH%' collate CASE_LIKE and processing_step1 =1 and processing_step2 =1  and processing_step3 =1 THEN 1 END) AS FH_OK,  
   SUM( CASE WHEN file_name LIKE '%FH%' collate CASE_LIKE and processing_step1 =1 and processing_step2 =1  and processing_step3 =2 THEN 1 END) AS FH_KO
FROM tin_data_item_in
WHERE creation_date BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
  ----AND file_name LIKE '%FH%' COLLATE CASE_LIKE
  AND (network IS NULL OR network IN ($vg_store));

SELECT    COUNT(*) AS FH_righe, 
   SUM(CASE WHEN processing_step1 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FASE1_FILE,
   SUM(CASE WHEN processing_step1 = 1 and processing_step2 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FASE2_ARRICHFILE,
   SUM(CASE WHEN processing_step1 = 1 and processing_step2 = 1  and processing_step3 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FASE3_CAR_BOOM,
   SUM(CASE WHEN processing_step1 = 1 and processing_step2 = 1  and processing_step3 = 1 and processing_step4 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FASE4_REGIA
   ---COUNT(DISTINCT item) AS IH_ARTICOLI,
 ---  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN processing_step1 = 1 THEN item END) AS FASE1_FILE_ART ,
  -- COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN processing_step1 = 1 and processing_step2 = 1  THEN item END) AS FASE2_ARRICHFILE_ART,
  --- COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN processing_step1 = 1 and processing_step2 = 1  and processing_step3 = 1 THEN item END) AS FASE3_CAR_BOOM_ART,
  --- COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN processing_step1 = 1 and processing_step2 = 1  and processing_step3 = 1 and processing_step4 = 1 THEN item END) AS FASE4_REGIA_ART
FROM tin_data_item_in
WHERE creation_date BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
  AND file_name LIKE '%FH%' COLLATE CASE_LIKE
  AND (network IS NULL OR network IN ($vg_store));

SELECT    
   SUM( CASE WHEN file_name LIKE '%HH%' collate CASE_LIKE and processing_step1 =1 and processing_step2 =1   THEN 1 END) AS HH_TOT,  
      SUM( CASE WHEN file_name LIKE '%HH%' collate CASE_LIKE and processing_step1 =1 and processing_step2 =1  and processing_step3 not in(1,2) THEN 1 END) AS HH_DA_ELAB , 
   SUM( CASE WHEN file_name LIKE '%HH%' collate CASE_LIKE and processing_step1 =1 and processing_step2 =1  and processing_step3 =1 THEN 1 END) AS HH_OK,  
   SUM( CASE WHEN file_name LIKE '%HH%' collate CASE_LIKE and processing_step1 =1 and processing_step2 =1  and processing_step3 =2 THEN 1 END) AS HH_KO
FROM tin_data_item_in
WHERE creation_date BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
  ----AND file_name LIKE '%HH%' COLLATE CASE_LIKE
  AND (network IS NULL OR network IN ($vg_store));

SELECT    COUNT(*) AS HH_righe, 
   SUM(CASE WHEN processing_step1 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FASE1_FILE,
   SUM(CASE WHEN processing_step1 = 1 and processing_step2 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FASE2_ARRICHFILE,
   SUM(CASE WHEN processing_step1 = 1 and processing_step2 = 1  and processing_step3 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FASE3_CAR_BOOM,
   SUM(CASE WHEN processing_step1 = 1 and processing_step2 = 1  and processing_step3 = 1 and processing_step4 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FASE4_REGIA
 --  COUNT(DISTINCT item) AS IH_ARTICOLI,
--   COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN processing_step1 = 1 THEN item END) AS FASE1_FILE_ART ,
 --  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN processing_step1 = 1 and processing_step2 = 1  THEN item END) AS FASE2_ARRICHFILE_ART,
 --  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN processing_step1 = 1 and processing_step2 = 1  and processing_step3 = 1 THEN item END) AS FASE3_CAR_BOOM_ART,
 ---  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN processing_step1 = 1 and processing_step2 = 1  and processing_step3 = 1 and processing_step4 = 1 THEN item END) AS FASE4_REGIA_ART
FROM tin_data_item_in
WHERE creation_date BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
  AND file_name LIKE '%HH%' COLLATE CASE_LIKE
  AND (network IS NULL OR network IN ($vg_store));

SELECT row_number() OVER(ORDER BY tdio.id)  nr_riga, 
   tdio.creation_date AS IL_data_creaz,
    tdio.update_date AS IL_data_agg,
    tdio.file_name AS IL_nome_file,
    tdio.number_line AS IL_num_riga,
    tdio.network AS IL_negozio,
    tdio.processing_step1 AS IL_fase_1,
    tdio.processing_step2 AS IL_fase_2,
    tdio.processing_step3 AS IL_fase_3,
    tdio.processing_step4 AS IL_fase_4,
    tdio.item AS IL_articolo,
    tdio.description_item AS IL_descrizione_articolo,
	tdio.structure_code as IL_strutt_merc,
	tdio.description_sale as IL_desc_vendita, 
	tdio.sale_code as IL_ean,
	tdio.supplier_code||' - '||tdio.operational_agreement as IL_fornitore,
	tdio.purchase_price as IL_prz_acq,
	tdio.sale_price as IL_prz_vend,
	'* TAB_ART *' as TAB_ART,
    ---ti.id AS id_art_ges,
    ti.item AS articolo,
    ttr.description AS desc_articolo,
   -- ( SELECT tscv.sale_code
   --        FROM tmd_sale_codes_var tscv
   --       WHERE tscv.item_sale_id = tis.id AND CURRENT_DATE >= tscv.start_date AND CURRENT_DATE <= tscv.end_date AND tscv.code_type_pc = tdio.sale_code_type_pc
    --     LIMIT 1) EAN,
    ----vmd.structure_code AS cod_strutt_ges,
   ----- vmd.description AS desc_strutt_ges,
	--'* TAB_FORN *' as TAB_FORN,
    ---tas.operational_agreement_id AS id_acc_oper_ges,
   -- ttp.third_party as forn,
   -- ttp.business_name as desc_forn,
   -- tma.operational_agreement AS acc_oper,
   -- tma.description AS desc_acc_oper,
--	'* TAB_PRZ_ACQ *' as TAB_PRZ_ACQ,
  --  tpp.price AS prz_acq,
--	'* TAB_PRZ_VEND *' as TAB_PRZ_VEND,
 ---   tsp.price AS prz_vend,
    '* DATI_INTERFACCIA *' as DATI_INTERFACCIA,
    tdio.error_message AS IL_mess_err,
    tdio.buffer_str as IL_buffer_dati
FROM
    tin_data_item_in tdio
LEFT JOIN
    tmd_networks tn ON tn.network_code = tdio.network
LEFT JOIN
    tmd_items ti ON ti.item = tdio.item
LEFT JOIN
    ttr_items ttr ON ttr.item_id = ti.id AND ttr.language_id = 1
--LEFT JOIN
 --   tmd_item_sales tis ON tis.item_id = ti.id AND tis.item_sale = 1
--LEFT JOIN
 --   vmd_items_structures vmd ON vmd.item_id = ti.id
 --   AND vmd.merchandise_structure_id = 1
  --  AND vmd.structure_level = 4
--LEFT JOIN
--    tmd_orderable_assortments tas ON tas.item_id = ti.id
 --   AND tas.network_id = tn.id
  --  AND tas.main_supplier = 1
  --  AND CURRENT_DATE BETWEEN tas.start_date AND tas.end_date
--LEFT JOIN
--    tmd_operational_agreements tma ON tma.id = tas.operational_agreement_id
--LEFT JOIN
 --   tmd_third_parties ttp ON ttp.id = tma.third_party_id
--LEFT JOIN
 --   tmd_purchase_prices tpp ON tpp.item_id = ti.id
 --   AND tpp.operational_agreement_id = tas.operational_agreement_id
  --  AND tpp.network_id = tn.id
   -- AND CURRENT_DATE BETWEEN tpp.start_date AND tpp.end_date
--LEFT JOIN
--    tmd_sale_prices tsp ON tsp.network_id = tn.id
 --   AND tsp.item_sale_id = tis.id
 --   AND CURRENT_DATE BETWEEN tsp.start_date AND tsp.end_date
WHERE
    tdio.creation_date BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
    AND (tdio.network IS NULL OR tdio.network IN ($vg_store))
    AND tdio.processing_step1::text IN ($vg_fase1)
    AND tdio.processing_step2::text IN ($vg_fase2)
    AND tdio.processing_step3::text IN ($vg_fase3)
    AND tdio.processing_step4::text IN ($vg_fase4)
AND (
  '$vg_codart' = '' 
  OR tdio.item like '$vg_codart' collate case_like
)
AND (
  '$vg_nomefile' = '' 
  OR tdio.file_name like '$vg_nomefile' collate case_like
)
    order by   tdio.file_name ,
    tdio.number_line ;

panels.title: Dettaglio Tabella di interfaccia PH, EH, IH, FH, SH

list.definition:
select tn.network_code AS __value, 
       concat(tn.network_code,' - ',tn.description)  AS __text
from   tmd_networks tn
where  network_node_type_pc = 4
and    network_cash is not null
--- Controllo utente
and   ('${__user.login}' = 'admin'
        or
        ((tn.id in (select network_id from vpr_auth_user_networks vaun where lower(user_code) = '${__user.login}')
         or
         (select is_superuser from TPR_USERS where  lower(user_code) = '${__user.login}') = 1))
    )    
order by tn.network_code
list.label: Negozio
list.name: vg_store
list.query:
select tn.network_code AS __value, 
       concat(tn.network_code,' - ',tn.description)  AS __text
from   tmd_networks tn
where  network_node_type_pc = 4
and    network_cash is not null
--- Controllo utente
and   ('${__user.login}' = 'admin'
        or
        ((tn.id in (select network_id from vpr_auth_user_networks vaun where lower(user_code) = '${__user.login}')
         or
         (select is_superuser from TPR_USERS where  lower(user_code) = '${__user.login}') = 1))
    )    
order by tn.network_code
